titleStmt.title: The declaration & protestation agreed upon by the grand iurie at the assizes held for the county of Salop the eight day of August 1642 and assented unto by the high sheriffe and divers of the iustices of peace gentlemen, and freeholders of the said countie there present.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G. Badger, and R. Marriot in St. Dunstans Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: In favor of the King. -- Thomason Catalogue.
Annotation on Thomason copy [inserted with a caret between 'Printed' and 'for' in the imprint]: "17 August".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
